definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Mary teaches religion. However, she is an atheist. She has an excellent sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽教宗教，但她自己却是个无神论者。

sentences.english: Atheists deny the existence of God.
sentences.chinese: 无神论者不相信上帝的存在。

sentences.english: If a person wants to be atheistic , it's his God-given right to be an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个人想成为无神论者，那也是上帝给他的权利。

sentences.english: Xiong Bolong was a distinguished atheist of China in 17th century.
sentences.chinese: 熊伯龙是十七世纪我国杰出的无神论者。

sentences.english: Atheists have the highest writing proficiency of any religious or nonreligious group.
sentences.chinese: 在各宗教与非宗教团体中无神论者的写作能力最强。

sentences.english: When it comes to planning, many Christians act like atheists.
sentences.chinese: 一谈到打算，很多基督徒都表现得像无神论者。

sentences.english: Dont doubt about this though they state themselves antitheists.
sentences.chinese: 不要怀疑，虽说他们都是无神论者。

sentences.english: Only the Atheist can be a consistent Secularist .
sentences.chinese: 只有无神论者可以一个一致的世俗。

sentences.english: Relating to or characteristic of atheism or atheists.
sentences.chinese: 无神论者就没有这样的引导。

sentences.english: It is often cynically said that there are no atheists in foxholes.
sentences.chinese: 很讽刺的是，在散兵坑里没有无神论者。

sentences.english: He's an atheist, she pretty much agnostic.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名无神论者，她则基本上是不可知论者。

sentences.english: Atheists do not believe in God.
sentences.chinese: 无神论者从来不相信有上帝。

sentences.english: I have found it is difficult to make a religious connection with atheists.
sentences.chinese: 我发现很难与无神论者建立宗教性的联结。

sentences.english: There is no such thing as an atheist in a foxhole.
sentences.chinese: 散兵坑里不存在无神论者。

sentences.english: Atheists don't kill in the name of Atheism.
sentences.chinese: 无神论者不会以无神论的名义屠杀。

sentences.english: No, Bertha, if you're an atheist I can have nothing more to do with you.
sentences.chinese: 不，伯莎，如果你是个无神论者，我不能再和你交往。

definition: theism (the belief in the existence of God)
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
to believe firmly/devout in one's faith
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
